abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would include: (a)
            track improvements; (b) the rehabilitation and strengthening
            of bridges; (c) improvements of telecommunications; (d) the
            procurement of motive power and rolling stock; (e) the
            procurement of equipment for workshops; and (f) consulting
            services and training.
